- [ ] make sure to add new files to `index.md`
- [ ] Use markdown preview to see your recipe rendered ([docs](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/markdown#_markdown-preview) or in [video-tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b3uTxjO7tAc&t=719s))

You can also follow the instruction in the `README.md` to build a preview. This should work directly on GitHub codespaces.
